personal.name: Christopher Heher
personal.title: Writer | Marketer | Conversational Design
personal.bio: Crafting strategic content that turns complex technical concepts into compelling narratives that drive pipeline and revenue.

achievements: Introduced artificial intelligence to optimize internal content processes throughout the organization - guiding training models, setting quality standards, and scaling production.

Unplanned obsolescence. Built out GTM strategy surrounding HP device upgrade campaign setagainst the rise of hybrid work: auditing HP's content repository, pitching full-funnel activations based on content gaps, and structuring insights for thought leadership content.

Sentry Dogfooding Chronicles. Created syndicated content series by integrating internal developer stories. Impact: 15+ backlinks per post + estimated ~$100K ARR per quarter based on increased brand recognition.

highlights: Drove $10M+ sales pipeline through strategic content
Created 'Your AI In the Sky' tagline for Safety AI rollout
8.5% deals influenced in pipeline
Wrote white papers on ground control points, underground utilities, facade inspections
Created 'See Slow Faster' tagline that helped propel company to 3x ARR
11% deals influenced in pipeline
1.7% engagement rate for meaningful actions
Owned content strategy for Performance product launch
Grew brand from 0 to 91K Instagram followers
1.5M bottles sold with 23 industry awards
Created brand manifesto and social media strategy
Taglines: 'All sunshine. No burn.', 'Good times deserve great tequila.'
Led strategic briefing process for enterprise clients in trial
Transformed static PDFs into interactive, mobile-first experiences
Clients: Goldman Sachs, Lendingclub, GE

experience.description: While working at talent agency Symphony Studio, I was assigned to writing Airbnb's career website. That first meant establishing their Employer Brand Proposition: that is, the values and benefits which differentiates Airbnb from not only their competitors, but the workforce at large. Working with Airbnb executives and HR stakeholders, we articulated AirBnb's core values, their Live and Work Anywhere policy, and growth opportunities with responsive, mobile-friendly content that speaks simply, directly, and strategically to candidates.

highlights: Won Facebook's FBIQ account with pitch deck
Led Espolon tequila social media
Shaped messaging for Verizon's go90 streaming platform launch
Copywriter on Mercedes-Benz digital account
Copywriter on Toyota + Canon

standout_projects.title: Sentry Performance Launch - 'See Slow Faster'
standout_projects.impact: Tagline helped propel company to 3x ARR. Simplified complex APM concepts (Apdex scores, p95 response times) into clear competitive differentiation.

standout_projects.title: DroneDeploy Safety AI Campaign
standout_projects.impact: $10M+ pipeline influence. Created 'Your AI In the Sky' positioning and comprehensive content suite for AI-powered construction safety platform.

standout_projects.title: Cincoro Tequila Brand Launch
standout_projects.impact: 0 to 91K followers, 1.5M bottles sold, 23 awards. Built brand voice for Michael Jordan's premium tequila in crowded celebrity spirits market.

standout_projects.title: Facebook IQ Event Launch
standout_projects.impact: Won account with pitch that connected Facebook culture to advertiser benefits. 200+ media leaders at premiere events.

standout_projects.title: Airbnb Careers Site
standout_projects.impact: Established Employer Brand Proposition and created responsive, mobile-friendly content articulating culture and benefits.

unique_strengths: Transforms technical jargon into compelling narratives (See Slow Faster, Your AI In the Sky)
5+ experience in developer tools and enterprise SaaS
Proven track record of pipeline influence (8-11% across roles)
Bridges gap between technical teams and business stakeholders
Strong understanding of AI/ML, cybersecurity, and DevOps concepts
